sys_script_include.name: CarBooking

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_3d961c681b4a6190dd39ed3abc4bcb5d
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_980836_car.CarBooking</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>CarBooking</name><script><![CDATA[var CarBooking = Class.create();

CarBooking.prototype = {

    initialize: function() {
        this.startTimeField = 'start';
        this.endTimeField = 'endtime';
        this.durationHours = 3;
    },

    /**
     * Populates the end time field based on the selected start time.
     */
    populateEndTime: function() {
        // Get the start time field value
        var startTime = this.getValue(this.startTimeField);
        
        // If the start time is empty, clear the end time field and return
        if (gs.nil(startTime)) {
            this.setValue(this.endTimeField, '');
            return;
        }
        
        // Create a new GlideDateTime object for the start time
        var startGdt = new GlideDateTime();
        startGdt.setDisplayValue(startTime, 'hh:mm aaa');
        
        // Add the duration hours to the start time to get the end time
        var endGdt = new GlideDateTime();
        endGdt.setValue(startGdt);
        endGdt.addHoursLocalTime(this.durationHours);
        
        // Set the end time field value
        var endTime = endGdt.getDisplayValue('hh:mm aaa');
        this.setValue(this.endTimeField, endTime);
    },

    /**
     * Helper function to get the value of a field.
     * @param {String} field The name of the field.
     * @returns {String} The value of the field.
     */
    getValue: function(field) {
        return this.current.variables[field] + '';
    },

    /**
     * Helper function to set the value of a field.
     * @param {String} field The name of the field.
     * @param {String} value The value to set.
     */
    setValue: function(field, value) {
        this.current.variables[field] = value;
    }

};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-04-03 13:07:42</sys_created_on><sys_id>3d961c681b4a6190dd39ed3abc4bcb5d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CarBooking</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Car" source="x_980836_car">4ae203981ba52510dd39ed3abc4bcb84</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Car">4ae203981ba52510dd39ed3abc4bcb84</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3d961c681b4a6190dd39ed3abc4bcb5d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-03 13:07:42</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
